protocol_name: Antibiotic sensitivity test for dinoflagellates and Chromera
protocol_name_html: Antibiotic sensitivity test for dinoflagellates and Chromera
protocol_affiliation: University of Tsukuba,University of British Columbia

groups.group_name: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

authors: Yoshihisa Hirakawa,Hirokazu Sakamoto,Takashi Shiratori,Elisabeth Hehenberger,Nick Irwin,Patrick Keeling
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"98nqm","text":"Seven dinoflagellate species (Amphidinium carterae, Glenodinium foliaceum, Heterocapsa triquetra, Karlodinium veneficum, Prorocentrum minimum, Symbiodinium minutum, and Togula britannica) and Chromera velia were grown in 75 mL plastic flasks with Daigo IMK (Nihon Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.), f\/2, or ESM medium. The culture condition was at 20\u02daC, under white illumination (60 \u00b5mol photons\/m-2\/s-1) on a 14:10 light:dark cycle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":30,"length":20,"style":"italic"},{"offset":52,"length":21,"style":"italic"},{"offset":75,"length":21,"style":"italic"},{"offset":98,"length":21,"style":"italic"},{"offset":121,"length":20,"style":"italic"},{"offset":143,"length":20,"style":"italic"},{"offset":169,"length":17,"style":"italic"},{"offset":192,"length":14,"style":"italic"},{"offset":389,"length":2,"style":"sup"},{"offset":393,"length":2,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"FF86E190E19011E89708B9720100386A","id":679816,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Algal culture"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ms6j","text":"Precultured cells were transferred to 24-well plates, and an antibiotic drug (puromycin or zeocin) was added with different concentrations (0, 50, 100, 300 \u00b5g\/mL). The cell density was 2,000 to 40,000 cells\/mL at the starting point. The culture plates were incubated under the same condition described above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"088F59C0E19111E89708B9720100386A","id":679817,"previous_id":679816,"previous_guid":"FF86E190E19011E89708B9720100386A","section":"Antibiotic treatment"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a18t9","text":"The number of living cells was counted under a microscope using hemacytometer during a week.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"2AA93580E19111E89708B9720100386A","id":679818,"previous_id":679817,"previous_guid":"088F59C0E19111E89708B9720100386A","section":"Cell monitoring"}
